CustomField.formula:
if ( OR( $User.ProfileId == $Label.USR_ProfileId_PFCommunityPlusSiteAccount, $User.ProfileId == $Label.USR_ProfileId_PFCommunityPlusUltimateAccount, $User.ProfileId == $Label.USR_ProfileId_PFCommunityPlusClientAccount) , IF (ISPICKVAL(Status,"Nouveau"),IMAGE("/client/resource/1554898927000/Case_Nouvelle_V2?","Nouvelle",20,130), IF (ISPICKVAL(Status,"En cours"),IMAGE("/client/resource/1555660884000/Case_EnCours_V2?","Encours",20,130), IF (ISPICKVAL(Status,"Terminé"),IMAGE("/client/resource/1555660944000/Case_Ferme_V2?","terminé",20,130), IF (ISPICKVAL(Status,"À replanifier"),IMAGE("/client/resource/1615383328000/Case_Ferme_Orange","Orange",20,130),'')))) ,
IF (ISPICKVAL(Status,"Nouveau"),IMAGE("/resource/1554898927000/Case_Nouvelle_V2?","Nouvelle",20,130), IF (ISPICKVAL(Status,"En cours"),IMAGE("/resource/1555660884000/Case_EnCours_V2?","Encours",20,130), IF (ISPICKVAL(Status,"Terminé"),IMAGE("/resource/1555660944000/Case_Ferme_V2?","terminé",20,130), IF (ISPICKVAL(Status,"À replanifier"),IMAGE("/resource/1615383328000/Case_Ferme_Orange","Orange",20,130),'')))) )
CustomField.label: Statut
